LanguageData.MoistDeciduousForest.label: moist deciduous forest
LanguageData.MoistDeciduousForest.description: The moist deciduous forest is a tropical seasonal ecoregion. They are sustained by the moisture-bearing monsoon winds. The ecoregion is bounded on drier ecoregions where the fauna do not reach to be considered Tropical Rainforest. The flora and fauna are abundant and vary depending the season. (RimUniverse - Biomes (Continued))
